runner.name: runner
runner.info: A spirited young athlete, Runner dashes through obstacles with remarkable agility and speed. His youthful energy and endurance make him a top choice for players who favor swift, dynamic gameplay.

cok.name: cok
cok.info: Hailing from a distant galaxy, Cok is a quirky alien with unique abilities. His extraterrestrial origin grants him special powers, offering a gameplay experience filled with surprises and unconventional tactics.

gran.name: gran
gran.info: Don't be fooled by her age; Gran is an old but remarkably fit character. She combines experience and stamina, proving that age is just a number. Her resilience and wise strategies appeal to players who enjoy a steady and calculated approach.

robot.name: robot
robot.info: A high-tech marvel, Robot is a sleek and advanced machine designed for precision and efficiency. Its robotic capabilities allow for extraordinary maneuvers and technical gameplay, attracting players who love a futuristic and strategic.

zai.name: zai
zai.info: Zai is the powerhouse of the roster. With his imposing size and unmatched strength, he bulldozes through obstacles with ease.

trap.name: trap
trap.info: Trap, the embodiment of calmness, glides through chaos with a laid-back attitude. His chilled-out vibe allows him to effortlessly navigate treacherous terrain.

coolman.name: coolman
coolman.info: Coolman lives up to his name with his robust physique and cool-headed tactics.
